name: send-visee
description: timvisee/send is a community-maintained fork of Mozilla Send, a self-hosted encrypted file sharing service with expiring links. Files are end-to-end encrypted in the browser and can be shared via short URLs.

features.title: End-to-End Encryption
features.description: End-to-end encrypts files in the browser before upload

features.title: Password Protection
features.description: Optionally secure shared files with passwords

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Handles files up to 2.5GB with chunked uploads

features.title: Download Tracking
features.description: Shows how many times a file has been downloaded

features.title: Data Privacy
features.description: All encryption happens client-side for maximum privacy
